subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Rangers traded left wing Lauri Korpikoski to the Phoenix Coyotes for right wing Enver Lisin. The Rangers also came to terms with the restricted free-agent forward Ryan Callahan on a multiyear deal. The deal avoided an arbitration hearing July 23. Callahan, 24, set career highs with 22 goals, 40 points and 81 games last season.
